Name: Fantasy Dungeon VR
About the game: It's a VR action roguelike with a focus on melee combat and all kinds of abilities. Use more than just swords for fighting. Collect and use all kinds of abilities that can be activated with your gestures. Randomly Generated Dungeons All dungeons are randomly generated with rooms filled with enemies, traps, and loot boxes. Fight With More Than Just Your Sword The quick-access menu provides 4 slots to each hand for weapons and abilities. Each weapon can carry 8 weapon abilities that can be triggered by gestures. Get Stronger with New Powers and Better Weapons Powers and weapons can be found in loot boxes and shops throughout the dungeons. In addition, randomly generated unique items grant you stats and abilities.
